mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.name,a.no,a.photo,b.s/c.ss rate, CASE WHEN b.s IS NULL THEN c.ss ELSE c.ss-b.s END loss FROM (SELECT user.*,sc.`classId` FROM USER LEFT JOIN sc ON user.`id` = sc.`studentId` WHERE sc.`classId` = #{courseId}) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT studentId,COUNT(*) s FROM SIGN LEFT JOIN record ON sign.`recordId` = record.`id` WHERE END IS NOT NULL AND courseId = #{courseId} GROUP BY studentId) b ON a.id = b.studentId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT courseId,COUNT(*) ss FROM record WHERE END IS NOT NULL AND courseId = #{courseId}) c ON a.classId = c.courseId ORDER BY rate DESC
